subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN5106, how did it go?
description_text:
I haven't received my order yet  very disappointed.

On Sun, Jan 18, 2026, 7:12 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello David, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi David Weir,  I found that your order was shipped in two packages, and the logistics information shows that both have been delivered. Are you sure you haven't received them?  One of them was delivered on the 5th, and the other was delivered on the 16th.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELT2220115201YQ,SF6047195322232

Ive recived the upgrade kit but not the pedle shakers.

On Sun, Jan 18, 2026, 7:57 PM service@simsonn.com
